info.brief_description: You are Jason. You shrink. Try to survive.
info.description:
Read rules first then the story intro at the bottom:
1.) No gay stuff, basically no guys in this interactive except for Jason. Interaction between girls is just fine because it is hot.
2.) No animals, insects, bugs, reptiles, etc, etc; meaning only plain ordinary awesome humans. Also No, characters from cartoons, anime, TV in general, video games, etc, etc. Characters are to be totally original made from the writer’s mind.
3.) The age range for new female characters is 16 to 35.
4.) The ways that Jason can be killed is; eaten, cooked then eaten, sat on, crushed by breasts, or crushed while being used for sexual purposes.
5.) If there is toilet stuff, there is to be no mentioning of crap or pee. It is to be clean. For example; She went to the bathroom to get rid of what was left of him. It is also to be clean if the shrunken person somehow survives digestion and comes out the girl or woman’s ass.
6.) Also, on the survival note, the only way that Jason can survive is by some fluke, like resistance to being digested. There are to be no outside influences for Jason's survival. No gadgets. Also on the gross note, besides not mentioning bathroom stuff, talk about the inside of the mouth of a girl or woman is to be clean. Let's just assume that the girl's mouth is clean and smells just fine.
7.) The shrinking limit, 3 to 20 inches.
8.) Editions are to be written in the second person prospective; for example: You climbed up onto the couch.
9.) I am being a nice by reducing the sentence minimum to four good sentences, no less, but more would be better.
10.) Use a spell checker like Microsoft Word on your editions. I will not tolerate misspelled words and bad grammar.
11.) If you add, you must make an original title for
the chapter, be creative.

The Story:
         This interactive is about a twenty year old guy named Jason. In this world, most girls and women have the power to shrink things, they really only use the power to shrink guys, and also girls that don’t have the power. You will take on the role of Jason. Most likely you will start out being shrunk. Being shrunk is a bad thing because most people that get shrunk are never heard from again, mainly because they end up as food for the girl or woman that shrunk them. When shrunk you have to get help from other girls or women that you think will use the power to turn you back to normal, but it will be hard to do because even if you find a girl or woman that says she will help you, she might get hungry and change her mind, if you don’t have her do it fast enough.

Possible characters other than you: All characters labeled here have the power.

Sally: Your sister, is 16 years old, 5ft 4ins. Cute and pretty with medium length red hair, C-cup breasts and with slightly plump body type with plump round ass and nice thighs. She has always said that one day she would shrink you and eat you up.

May: Your 22 year old cousin, she is 5ft 7ins. She has long brunette hair that flows down to her D-cup breasts; she is perfectly in between a lean and plump body type. She has nice long legs with a tight round ass. Since your mom is never home because of being on travel for work, May comes over a lot to watch your sister. You’ve always wondered if she was plotting something because she loves to poke you and wink at you while licking her lips. You have actually had several dreams about making love with her but they always end with her shrinking and eating you.

Amanda: Your girlfriend. She is 21 years old, 5ft 5ins, with medium length black hair. She has mesmerizing light blue eyes and a few freckles on her cheeks. She has C-cup breasts and a semi-plump body type with a plump round ass and nice thighs. She lives in an apartment close to the college in town. When you are going to college, you live with her. You aren’t afraid of being shrunk and eaten by her. She has been so nice and kind to you that if she did decide to shrink and eat you up, you probably wouldn’t care, and tell her to enjoy you.
